keyMoments.title: Rock Arrives as Legendary Assassin
keyMoments.description: Rock, one half of the Yeti Cool Brothers, arrives at the destroyed laboratory to assassinate the Straw Hats on Caesar Clown's orders.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Rock as a major antagonist and threat to the Straw Hats during the Punk Hazard arc.

keyMoments.title: Rock Attacks the Straw Hats
keyMoments.description: Rock participates in the assault on the Straw Hats at the destroyed laboratory.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Rock's combat abilities and establishes him as a formidable opponent.

bounties.reason: Legendary assassin of the snowy mountains

abilities.description: Environmental combat technique using icicles to attack opponents.

relationships.description: Rock and Scotch are brothers who work together as the Yeti Cool Brothers assassin duo.

evolutionMoments.description: Rock and Scotch are introduced working together to eliminate the Straw Hats.

reveals.information: One of the legendary Yeti Cool Brothers assassins
Hired by Caesar Clown to kill the Straw Hats

keyMoments.title: Scotch Arrives as Legendary Assassin
keyMoments.description: Scotch, one half of the Yeti Cool Brothers, arrives at the destroyed laboratory to assassinate the Straw Hats on Caesar Clown's orders.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Scotch as a major antagonist and threat to the Straw Hats during the Punk Hazard arc.

keyMoments.title: Scotch Kills Brownbeard
keyMoments.description: Scotch plays a recording of Caesar's betrayal order and shoots Brownbeard, killing him.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Scotch's ruthlessness and establishes the deadly nature of the Yeti Cool Brothers. This is a pivotal moment showing Caesar's cruelty.

bounties.reason: Legendary assassin of the snowy mountains

abilities.description: Specialized gas ammunition containing chemical agents to incapacitate targets.

relationships.description: Scotch and Rock are brothers who work together as the Yeti Cool Brothers assassin duo.

evolutionMoments.description: Rock and Scotch are introduced working together to eliminate the Straw Hats.

reveals.information: One of the legendary Yeti Cool Brothers assassins
Hired by Caesar Clown to kill the Straw Hats

keyMoments.title: Brownbeard's Betrayal and Death
keyMoments.description: Brownbeard is confronted by Scotch, who plays a recording of Caesar Clown calling him useless and ordering his death. Devastated by the betrayal, Brownbeard is shot and killed.
keyMoments.significance: Marks Brownbeard's tragic end and reveals Caesar's ruthless nature. His death demonstrates that Caesar views his subordinates as expendable.
keyMoments.quote: There must have been a mistake. I'm assigned to work with you to take out the Straw Hats!

statusHistory.deathCircumstances: Shot by Scotch on Caesar Clown's orders

reveals.information: Caesar Clown ordered Brownbeard's death, calling him useless

name.japanese: トラファルガー・D・ワーテル・ロー

keyMoments.title: Law's Arrival at Punk Hazard Revealed
keyMoments.description: A flashback reveals that Law arrived at Punk Hazard seeking refuge and made a deal with Caesar Clown. In exchange for staying on the island and having Caesar heal his subordinates, Law gave Caesar his heart as collateral.
keyMoments.significance: Explains Law's vulnerable position and his complicated relationship with Caesar. This backstory is crucial for understanding Law's actions and motivations during the Punk Hazard arc.

keyMoments.title: Law's Connection to Luffy Exposed
keyMoments.description: Monet reveals to Caesar that Law has connections to Luffy from their time in Sabaody Archipelago, making Caesar suspicious of Law's loyalty.
keyMoments.significance: Creates tension in Law's relationship with Caesar and foreshadows Law's true alliance with the Straw Hats.

keyMoments.title: Law Confronts Caesar's Guards
keyMoments.description: Despite giving his heart to Caesar, Law begins actively confronting Caesar's subordinates, demonstrating his willingness to act against the organization.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Law's courage and commitment to his plan, even while in a vulnerable position.

reveals.information: Law arrived at Punk Hazard seeking refuge and gave his heart to Caesar as collateral
Caesar becomes aware of Law's connection to Luffy

keyMoments.title: Caesar Becomes Suspicious of Law
keyMoments.description: After learning from Monet about Law's connection to Luffy, Caesar becomes suspicious of Law's true intentions and loyalty.
keyMoments.significance: Escalates tension between Caesar and Law, setting up future conflicts.

keyMoments.title: Caesar Orders Brownbeard's Death
keyMoments.description: Caesar's pre-recorded message calling Brownbeard useless and ordering his death is played by Scotch before killing Brownbeard.
keyMoments.significance: Reveals Caesar's ruthless and manipulative nature, showing he views his subordinates as disposable.

reveals.information: Caesar is willing to kill loyal subordinates he deems useless

keyMoments.title: Monet Reveals Law's Connection to Luffy
keyMoments.description: Monet informs Caesar Clown that Trafalgar Law has connections to Monkey D. Luffy from their encounters at Sabaody Archipelago.
keyMoments.significance: Monet's intelligence gathering creates suspicion between Caesar and Law, advancing the plot.

keyMoments.title: Nami Kidnapped by Yeti Cool Brothers
keyMoments.description: While still in Franky's body due to Law's ability, Nami is successfully abducted by the Yeti Cool Brothers despite Luffy's attempt to rescue her.
keyMoments.significance: Creates urgency for a rescue mission and demonstrates the threat level of the Yeti Cool Brothers.
